Sentencas: We studied the surface morphology of a modified anode structure that is capable of increasing the triple phase boundary (TPB) and the effect of its morphological feature on the electrochemical performances.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: The top surface area of the anode functional layer (AFL) was increased to extend the TPB length and the high contact area between the electrolyte and the AFL.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: To increase the top surface area of the AFL, carbon particles, which have a particle size larger than 10 mm, were mixed with the AFL slurry solution and coated on the anode support layer.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: Carbon particles were burned-out prior to coating the electrolyte layer on the AFL.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: As a result, the electrolyte could be successfully coated on the top of the AFL, which has a rough morphology.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: Enhanced roughness of the top surface of the AFL via the modification process was verified through atomic force microscopy (AFM) analysis.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: In addition, the microstructures of the contact area between the AFL and electrolyte were studied through the use of scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: The Solid Oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with a modified AFL displayed excellent performance in power density and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS), in comparison with a cell that had a normal AFL.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method

Sentencas: Additionally, the cell with a modified AFL exhibited a 74% higher peak power density value than the cell with a flat AFL and displayed the lowest resistance value in EIS results.
Titulo: Fabrication of thin films on an anode support with surface modification for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells via a dip-coating method
